page.title: 02LIFE STYLES
page.content:
{{Collingtree School Uniform} {The Girls Uniform} In summer we wear blue and white checked dresses,and in the winter we wear grey skirts,white shirts and navy jumpers or cardigans. {The Boys Uniform} All through winter the boys wear white or grey shirts,and in summer they can wear any colour shorts. Also in the winter they wear grey trousers. I think the school uniform is a bit boring,it could be a bit more modern. For example the girls jumpers and cardigans could have batwing sleeves and their skirts could be tight or mini,and for the boys uniform they could have jeans and in the summer wear T-shirts
ME,
